author: Lego_fan_
title: S.O.G gang builder
review:
This Lego Buffer magazine gift is a must have for any Ninjago collection. 

Buffer as seen in Ninjago masters of Spinjitsu season eight "The Sons of Garmadon" is a very cool looking minifigure. 

His details include a motorcycle jacket with the S.O.G skull printed on it, his bare "buff" arms, a tough looking fave with stubble dots on it, two katanas, a shield, and a helmet with night vision googles on it. 

Overall this charecter looks very true to the show, and is a must have for any die hard Ninjago colecter or anybody who wants to build their S.O.G gang. Now we just need to see Ninjago  army builder sets kind like the Chima or Star Wars ones.
